description:
Elevate your cooking with Shan Zafrani Garam Masala, a premium blend of aromatic spices. This 50g pack offers a rich, warm flavor perfect for curries, stews, and more.  Its unique saffron-infused recipe adds a touch of luxury to every dish.

Shan's Zafrani Garam Masala features a carefully balanced mix of saffron, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and other select spices.  The 'V-Locked' freshness ensures consistent quality and taste.  Enjoy the authentic taste of Shan.

This versatile masala is a kitchen essential for both novice and expert cooks. Add depth and complexity to your favorite recipes. Order now and experience the difference!

Create authentic Korma dishes with Shan Korma Masala! This 50g recipe & seasoning mix delivers rich, aromatic flavors.  Simply add to your favorite meats or vegetables for a restaurant-quality Korma at home.  Experience the convenience and delicious taste of Shan. 

This blend features a unique combination of spices for a truly authentic Korma experience.  It's easy to use and perfect for both beginner and experienced cooks.  The 50g pack is ideal for multiple servings, ensuring you have enough for several delicious meals.

Elevate your cooking with the trusted quality of Shan.  Enjoy the rich and flavorful Korma you've always dreamed of.  Order now and savor the taste of tradition!

Unleash the rich, aromatic depths of authentic Nihari with SHAN__NIHARI_MASALA!  Experience the tender, melt-in-your-mouth goodness of this classic Pakistani dish, effortlessly. Our expertly blended spices deliver an unparalleled flavour explosion, transforming your cooking into a culinary masterpiece.  Save time and elevate your Nihari game today!

This premium blend contains a unique selection of hand-picked spices, including fragrant cloves, warming ginger, and zesty black peppercorns.  It's easy to use â€“ simply add to your simmering Nihari for a depth of flavour you won't find anywhere else.  No artificial colours or preservatives.  Enjoy the authentic taste of home, made easy.

Get ready to impress your family and friends with a truly unforgettable Nihari.  Add SHAN__NIHARI_MASALA to your cart now and experience the difference! Perfect for beginners and experienced cooks alike.  Follow the simple instructions on the pack for best results.  Enjoy!

Elevate your culinary creations with National Garam Masala Powder, a quintessential blend of aromatic spices. This 50g pack offers a traditional mix, perfectly balancing warmth and complexity to enhance curries, stews, and more.  Its rich, finely ground texture seamlessly integrates into your dishes, delivering consistent flavor in every spoonful.

Made with a traditional blend of 7 carefully selected spices, including cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and black pepper, this garam masala is expertly roasted and ground for optimal taste.  National's commitment to quality ensures a premium spice experience, free from artificial additives.  The convenient 50g packaging is perfect for both everyday cooking and experimenting with new recipes.

Unleash the authentic flavors of India with National Garam Masala.  Add a dash to your favorite dishes or use it as a base for your own unique spice creations.  Order yours today and discover the difference quality spices make!

Unleash the fiery flavor of SHAN__ACHAR_GHOST, the ultimate ghost pepper achar!  Experience a thrilling blend of sweet, sour, and intensely spicy notes that will ignite your taste buds.  Perfect as a condiment, side dish, or ingredient for your favorite recipes, this achar adds a unique kick to any meal. Prepare for a flavor explosion!

Crafted with the finest ghost peppers, carefully balanced with tangy spices and aromatic herbs.  Our unique recipe delivers a consistent, high-quality experience.  Each jar contains 150g of pure deliciousness.  Enjoy the intense heat and complex flavors in every bite.  Guaranteed to add a fiery twist to your culinary adventures.

Add a dash of SHAN__ACHAR_GHOST to your samosas, curries, or even eggs for an unforgettable spicy twist!  A little goes a long way.  Order yours today and experience the ultimate ghost pepper achar.  Spice up your life!

Elevate your culinary creations with Shan Chaat Masala, a vibrant blend of spices perfect for adding a tangy and aromatic kick to your favorite dishes.  This 100g pack is ideal for creating delicious chaat, adding zest to snacks, or as a flavorful garnish. 

Shan Chaat Masala is a versatile seasoning mix, easily incorporated into various recipes. Its unique blend of spices provides a tangy flavor profile, enhancing the taste of your dishes.  It's vegetarian-friendly and conveniently packaged for easy use.

Spice up your snacks, appetizers, and main courses with this authentic, high-quality masala.  Order your Shan Chaat Masala today and experience the difference!

Create delicious Seekh Kababs with Shan's authentic Seekh Kabab Masala! This 50g pack provides a premium blend of spices for an exclusive BBQ experience.  The carefully selected ingredients deliver rich, aromatic flavor, elevating your grilling to new heights.

Shan's masala is a convenient and easy-to-use seasoning mix. Simply follow the instructions on the pack for perfectly seasoned kababs every time.  It's vegetarian-friendly and contains no artificial preservatives.

Impress your family and friends with restaurant-quality Seekh Kababs made with Shan's expertise.  Order now and experience the difference authentic spices make!

Enhance your cooking with National Pure Garlic Powder! This 50g pack offers a strong aroma and freshly ground flavor, perfect for adding a delicious garlic punch to your dishes.  It's ideal for soups, stews, sauces, marinades, and more. 

Made with 100% pure garlic, this powder provides a convenient and consistent way to enjoy the taste of fresh garlic without the prep work. Its strong aroma and freshly ground texture ensure a superior flavor experience.  It's also free from artificial preservatives.

Elevate your culinary creations with National's Pure Garlic Powder.  Add a dash to your favorite recipes for an intense garlic flavor. Order yours today and experience the difference!
